item.description:
First Friday of the month, 6:30-9:30 pm

Join us on the first Friday of every month for a spirited evening of socializing. Enjoy music, cocktails, friends new and old, and fine art. There is no other way to start the month!

Open to visitors twenty-one and older.

Museum Members: entry is FREE.
Non-Museum members: entry is FREE with Museum admission.

*Meeting details - We will meet in the Calderwood Courtyard near the band. This is our first outdoor MFA meeting, so call me if you have trouble finding us. Please try to get there before 8pm, as this place gets crowded as the night progresses. If you plan on coming after 8pm, you will be better off calling me at 646-541-0708 to find out the whereabouts of our group.*

For more information, see http://www.mfa.org/ca...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Museum of Fine Arts - MFA First Fridays
